events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I am not satisfied with the product.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer requested a refund for a purchased jacket due to dissatisfaction with fit.
Support agent Jessica M. has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's jacket purchase.
Hello! This is Jessica from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund. Iâ€™m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the jacket so I can start the refund process?
The order number is 5489237. The jacket is too small even though I ordered my usual size. I would like to return it for a refund.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process and sent you the return shipping label. Please send back the jacket, and the refund will be processed after we receive it.
Thanks for helping me so quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and will send back the jacket as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on the refund process and our support service.
